newsitem.title: CROATIA: Croatian stocks mixed in livelier business.
newsitem.headline: Croatian stocks mixed in livelier business.

text.p: Croatian stocks were mixed in livelier business on Tuesday, with slight price movements for most of the blue chips.
* Seven of 18 active stocks rose, eight fell and three were flat.
* Volume more than tripled to 11,386 shares, turnover also rose to 5.4 million kuna.
* Top gainer Adriatic pipeline operator Janaf climbed 800 kuna to 6,400, selling 43 shares.
* Biggest decliner hotelier Istraturist lost 12 kuna to 193, with 180 shares changing hands.
* Most active food processor Podravka inched up one kuna to 305 on volume of 3,879 units. -- Zagreb newsroom, 385-1-4557075
